[{"id":"4a6961ab-f879-48c2-842d-796795fa856d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: create_def","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"43ce19c9-2154-4371-82e3-d4011c7703da","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"create_def","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function acts as a safeguard to ensuring that a specific name is officially registered within the current analysis scope. Its primary job is to "claim" a name in the current block of code (like a function or a module) so that the analyzer can attach information to it later.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"eb2870de-66f9-4362-ac89-61f5e83c6b5e","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"When Python encounters an import like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"from pandas import DataFrame","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the name ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"DataFrame","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" effectively becomes a local variable in your file. To track this, the analyzer needs a "definition" object representing this local ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"DataFrame","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This function checks if that object exists, and if not, creates it.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8fa20228-0596-46ee-963e-8e5c01db86c3","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bc0b4c23-d1d4-4482-97a2-964b9ce5c922","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Check Existence:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It looks at the current scope (e.g., the function body or file you are currently in) to see if the name (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"json","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") is already defined.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5bb3f556-e970-41f4-a967-68232df60685","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Calculate Namespace:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If the name is missing, it calculates a unique "full address" for it. For example, if you are inside a function ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"process_data","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in module ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"main","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and you import ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"json","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the full address becomes ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"main.process_data.json","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3a35bbf8-8050-4d3f-82cd-a960cf521923","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Create or Retrieve:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It checks the central Definition Manager to see if a definition for that address already exists globally. If not, it creates a new one marked as a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"NAME_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (a generic name definition).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"59326f81-6bba-4fe1-8641-dd6b8e59c207","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Register:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Finally, it officially adds this definition to the current scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9bae0e2b-31fa-4c35-b316-3348952fcc68","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
